title: Deep Freeze Object
description: In this lab, we will explore how to deep freeze an object in JavaScript. We will learn how to use the Object.freeze() method recursively to freeze all properties of an object, making it immutable. By the end of this lab, you will have a better understanding of how to prevent modifications to objects and ensure data integrity in your JavaScript code.

meta.title: Deep Freeze Object: Immutable JavaScript Objects
meta.description: Learn how to deep freeze JavaScript objects, making them immutable and ensuring data integrity in your code.
meta.keywords: javascript, javascript practice, freeze, data integrity, javascript practice online, object, javascript lab, immutable, javascript tutor

verify.name: Verify Node Commands Usage
verify.hint: JavaScript can be run in the Terminal/SSH by typing 'node' and pressing Enter.

i18n.title: 深度冻结对象
i18n.description: 在本实验中，我们将探索如何在JavaScript中深度冻结一个对象。我们将学习如何递归地使用Object.freeze()方法来冻结对象的所有属性，使其不可变。在本实验结束时，你将更好地理解如何防止对对象进行修改，并确保JavaScript代码中的数据完整性。

meta.title: 深度冻结对象：不可变的JavaScript对象
meta.description: 学习如何深度冻结JavaScript对象，使其不可变并确保代码中的数据完整性。
meta.keywords: JavaScript, JavaScript实践, 冻结, 数据完整性, 在线JavaScript实践, 对象, JavaScript实验, 不可变, JavaScript教程

verify.name: 验证Node命令的用法
verify.hint: 在终端/SSH中，可以通过输入'node'并按下回车键来运行JavaScript。
